name: Shinkai: Coinbase Transaction Sender
description: Tool for restoring a Coinbase wallet and sending a transaction
author: Shinkai

name.description: The name of the Coinbase wallet

privateKey.description: The private key of the Coinbase wallet

walletId.description: Optional wallet ID for specific wallet selection

seed.description: Optional seed phrase for wallet recovery

useServerSigner.description: Optional flag to use server-side signing

recipient_address.description: The destination address for the transaction

assetId.description: The ID of the asset/token to send

amount.description: The amount of tokens to send

transactionHash.description: The hash of the completed transaction

transactionLink.description: A link to view the transaction on a block explorer
